coded_answer.p: I am writing to tell you about the festival in this time and I would like to suggest to you three things for the next festival.

First of all, it is a great idea to have a this kind of festival. I enjoyed it so much. But, there are three things which I would like to tell you. Firstly. There, there were stars and artists from only six countries. I supposedexpected to see quite various nationalitya variety of nationalities. Secondly, I actually liked the Jazz, rock and classical concerts very much. However, some concert halls were too small for the manylarge number of people so we couldn't have a enough space. thirdly.Thirdly, I would like to you to consider about having more plays and films next year. It would be nicer.
Otherwise, the price was really reasonable for all :events the weekendthe weekend events. I was satisfied with that.
And if there was musical event. It, it would be greatfulgreat. I hope the next one will be better. And I would like to thank you aboutfor makingorganising this festival.
I look forward to the next festival very much.
Hello. How are you doing? I hope you're well. It's nice to hear about your class. It's quite interesting.

Let me tell you some rules at school in my country. Actually. We, we have quite strict rules. When I was a student, I wasn't allowed to wear any fashionable clothes. Only It was like a formal clothes. And we couldn't wear any colorfulcolourful clothes and socks. Also our hair stylehairstyle was the same asfor everyone. It's really strict.

At home. There, there is one thing I'd like to change. I'm not allowed to sleep at my friend's house. I really like chatting all night with my friends. But I can't do it. I'm pursuadingpersuading my mum, perhaps. The school rules in my country are more strict than in your country.
Anyway. If, if you want to know about something of our country., I'm glad to tell you more.
I'm looking forward to getting your letter soon.
Thank you. Take care of yourself.
